title: Total brand value major sports leagues ( NFL , MLB , NBA & NHL ) 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) for 4 number of Sports Leagues.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
The highest Sports League National Football League has 7571.4 more Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) than the lowest Sports League National Hockey League.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) for 4 number of Sports Leagues.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is appeared to be the highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) for 4 number of Sports Leagues.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
The highest Sports League National Football League has 7571.4 more Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) than the lowest Sports League National Hockey League.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) for 4 number of Sports Leagues.
Sports League National Football League has the highest Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) and National Hockey League has the lowest Brand value (in million U.S. dollars).
There is a difference of 7571.4 between the maximum Sports League National Football League and minimum Sports League National Hockey League.
Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) at Sports League National Football League is 9131.8 , second place is Major League Baseball at 4408.8, and thirdly is National Basketball Association at 2734.6.
The average Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in all 4 Sports Leagues is 4458.9.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is 17835.6 if we add up values of all Sports Leagues.
